body_html:
Hello,

I have exactly the same problem, but I didn't get how you solved it. Can you give me more details, please? I tried to export the path to libcudnn.so, with export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/cuda/lib64 , but it didn't work.

body:
Hello,

I have exactly the same problem, but I didn't get how you solved it. Can you give me more details, please? I tried to export the path to libcudnn.so, with export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/cuda/lib64 , but it didn't work.
